List

New in Quest 5.4

"list" is a sequence of any attribute type. The format is:

 <myattribute type="list">
   <value type="string">a string value</value>
   <value type="int">123</value>
 </myattribute>

Usually it is better to use a stringlist (if all elements in the list will be strings) or an objectlist (if all elements in the list will be objects) instead.
